price: Hindi sila makaririnig doon [sa Paraiso] ng isang kabalbalan ni isang pagsisinungaling,
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
